I am also working on WebServices and need guidance on JunitTesting of WebServices. i have tried using WSDL to Java in Eclipse platform using -t arguments. Then it generates client stubs along with unit testcase.... Youcan then add methods and modify them according to your requirements... this is only way i know... is there any other way?

vkv3056 <vkv3056@...> wrote:          Hi,
Please provide some info on Junit testing of web services. I am sure 
someone has done it.
Cheers.
vk.
